docs.title: AI From Scratch
docs.text:
Welcome — this site documents ML and DL algorithms implemented from scratch in multiple languages and runtimes: Python → C++ → CUDA → Triton.

Use the Projects section to add implementations and tutorials.

docs.title: Roadmap (6 months)
docs.text:
1. Month 1 — Fundamentals & Python-only implementations
  2. Month 2 — C++ conversions and tensor primitives
  3. Month 3 — CUDA basics (matmul, relu, softmax)
  4. Month 4 — CUDA backprop & convolution kernels
  5. Month 5 — Triton fused kernels and attention
  6. Month 6 — Transformer block in all runtimes + polish

docs.title: Linear Regression — Python → C++ → CUDA → Triton
